productName: DCP-L2640DW Multifunction Duplex WIFI ADF Laser Printer Brother DCP-L2640DW Fast Multifunction Dual Band WIFI Duplex ADF Printer
description:
A4 print speed up to 34 ppm (Black)
USB 2.0, LAN, WiFi, WiFi Direct, AirPrint, Mopria, Mobile Connect
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, ADF (Automatic Document Feeder), Intuitive Buttons, 2 Line LCD Display, 256 MB Memory, 250 Sheets Paper Tray
Full capacity toner included. Yield up to 3000 pages (black)*
Compatible Brother Apps - BRAdmin Light, BRAdmin Pro4 : Windows App (By Download)
1 Year on-site warranty included
